name: Album Cover
description: This photo comes from a group project where we played around with lighting to get this cool chromatic effect. Then, I edited it to look like an album cover.

name: Hand with a hole
description: This hand above is from my very first project in school. We had to create an image using masks in Adobe Photoshop.

name: Racist Chairs
description: This was a video project with the task of personifying an object. I decided to create a short story about a chair of different color being excluded and mistreated.

name: Hell Sjove
description: Hell Sjove, a Minecraft short film, was a collab with 2 others for The Cubies. I filmed and edited while they acted. It's about a principal who hates stutens who arrive on time. We won 3 out of 6 awards.

name: Tennis Ball
description: This is our first video project where we had a day to make a video of ball travelling around the school.

name: Studio Week
description: This video was from a studio week we had early in our first year. We were in groups of 7 and my job was to cut the create graphics, cut cameras live, and edit the final product.

name: Cinemagraph
description: This is a project where we were told to make a cinemagraph. This involvs having moving parts on a still image.

name: Ã˜kernBBIL
description: In this project, we designed a logo and branding manual for a made-up basketball team. This image is the logo I designed.

name: Color Palette
description: Above is a color palette we were told to make. My color palette was inspired by the anime character Ryo Yamada
